# {{lb|zh|Min Dong|non-face-to-face}} [[father]]
#: {{zh-x|'''郎罷''' 別 囝，吾 悔 生 汝。及 汝 既 生，人 勸 不 舉。不 從 人言，果 獲 是 苦。囝 別 '''郎罷'''，心 摧 血 下。|'''Father''' said to son when they parted: I regret begetting you;<br>When you were already born, people advised me to not bring you up;<br>I did not follow their words, and inevitably had this suffering coming.<br>Son is parted from '''father''', with a heart shattered and eyes crying with blood.|CL|ref=ca. '''8th century''', {{w|Gu Kuang}}, {{lang|zh|《囝》}} (''Son'') [written in the ancient Min dialect].<br>''Note'': This poem was referring to the slavery system at the time in the [[Min]] area. The son had been forcibly castrated and was soon to be taken as a slave in a rich household.}}
